text: "Star Guitar" is a 2002 song by The Chemical Brothers and is the second single from their fourth studio album Come with Us. It went to number 8 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 49 in New Zealand, number 52 in Australia, number 10 in Ireland, number 3 in Canada, number 22 in Italy, number 15 in Finland, number 1 in Spain and number 42 in Sweden. The music video is filmed on a train in France. ==Track listings== UK and Australian CD single US 12-inch single # "Star Guitar" (edit) # "Base 6" # "Star Guitar" (Pete Heller's expanded mix) UK 12-inch single :A. "Star Guitar" :B.
